entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 10:36 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:36 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:36 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
